errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.sessionExpiredDescription: Please log in again to continue.
errors.contactSupport: Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
errors.loadingData: An error occurred while loading data

canvas.sessionExpiredGuidance: Please try again, or refresh your browser and log back in if the problem persists.
canvas.noPermission: You don't have permission to access this Canvas content
canvas.noPermissionGuidance: This course may be restricted or you may need additional permissions. Contact your Canvas administrator or course instructor for access.
canvas.notFoundGuidance: The requested course or modules may have been removed or are no longer available.
canvas.serverErrorGuidance: There's an issue with the Canvas integration. Please try again in a few minutes.
canvas.connectionGuidance: Please check your Canvas connection and try again.

auth.loginRequired: You need to log in again to continue
auth.refreshGuidance: Please refresh the page and log in again.

network.issue: Network connection issue. Please check your internet connection and try again.
network.guidance: Check your internet connection and try again. If the problem persists, the service may be temporarily unavailable.

retryable.temporary: This appears to be a temporary issue. Please try again in a few moments.
retryable.contactSupport: If this problem continues, please contact support for assistance.

userSettings.title: User Settings
userSettings.description: Manage your account settings and preferences
userSettings.privacyNotice: Review our <privacyLink>Privacy Policy</privacyLink> to understand how we handle your data.

language.title: Interface Language
language.description: Select your preferred language for the application interface. This is independent from the quiz content language.
language.englishDescription: Use English for the user interface

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: This will delete all your user data. Quizzes and questions you created will not be deleted, but they will no longer be connected to your account. The user ID of your quizzes will be set to "NULL".
deleteAccount.warningOngoing: Make sure that any ongoing quizzes are completed before proceeding.
deleteAccount.confirmationMessage: All your account data will be permanently deleted. If you are sure, please click 'Delete' to proceed. This action cannot be undone.
deleteAccount.success: Your account has been successfully deleted

welcome.title: Welcome to QuizCrafter
welcome.description: Thanks for trying us out. Let us show you around and help you get started with everything our application has to offer.

setup.title: Getting Started
setup.tip1: Connect to Canvas and select a course where you are enrolled as a teacher
setup.tip2: Choose course modules to include â€” the more content, the better the questions
setup.tip3: Review generated questions and approve or reject them before exporting to Canvas

features.title: Prepare your courses
features.intro: To generate the best questions for the material, ensure that
features.tip1: Content are using "pages" or uploaded as PDFs
features.tip2: All content is being referenced with a module
features.tip3: Describe any diagrams/images/equations with plain text

privacy.title: Privacy & Data Usage
privacy.description: Before getting started, please take a moment to review our privacy policy to understand how we handle your data and quiz information.
privacy.agreement: By continuing, you confirm that you have read and agree to our Privacy Policy.

notFound.title: Oops!
notFound.message: The page you are looking for was not found.

login.description: Turn your Canvas course material into high-quality quizzes with LLMs. Build your question bank, approve with a click, and generate quizzes in minutes.
login.errorMessage: There was an error processing your request: {{error}}
